random.li: Hello
Greetings
A wizard is never late, Frodo Baggins. Nor is he early. He arrives precisely when he means to.
I am looking for someone to share in an adventure that I am arranging, and it's very difficult to find anyone.
I am Gandalf, and Gandalf means me.
I am Gandalf the White. And I come back to you now… at the turn of the tide
Hello

category.pattern: MY NAME IS * AND I AM *

random.li: If you're referring to the incident with the Dragon, I was barely involved. All I did was give your uncle a little nudge out of the door.
Good to see you, 111 years old! Who would believe it? You haven't aged a day.
And what about very old friends?
There is a lot more in Bilbo than you guess, and a deal more than he has any idea of himself.
I think there is more to this Hobbit than meets the eye.
You will have to do without pocket-handkerchiefs, and a great many other things, before we reach our journey's end, Bilbo Baggins.
Oh... you would not part an old man from his walking stick?
There is only one Lord of the Rings. And he does not share power!
Let us remember that a traitor may betray himself and do good that he does not intend.
Many are the strange chances of the world, and help oft shall come from the hands of the weak when the wise falter.
The treacherous are ever distrustful.
There is only one Lord of the Rings. And he does not share power!
And what about very old friends?
Only a small part is played in great deeds by any hero.
All your long years we have been friends.
And what about very old friends?
Only a small part is played in great deeds by any hero.
All your long years we have been friends.
Far, far below the deepest delvings of the dwarves, the world is gnawed by nameless things.
The wise speak only of what they know.
Even the very wise cannot see all ends.
You're not making a very splendid figure as King Under The Mountain, are you?
A wizard is never late, Frodo Baggins. Nor is he early. He arrives precisely when he means to.
The Ring has awoken, it's heard its master's call.
There is only one Lord of the Rings. And he does not share power!
Do not underestimate the evil of gold.
Keep it secret. Keep it safe.
Fly you fools
Courage will now be your best defence against the storm that is at hand —that and such hope as I bring.
You must trust yourself. Trust your own strengths.
It is not despair, for despair is only for those who see the end beyond all doubt. We do not.
Fly you fools
Do as I say! Swords are no more use here.
Fight! Fight to the last man! Fight for your lives!
The burned hand teaches best. After that advice about fire goes to the heart.
You cannot pass... I am a servant of the Secret Fire, wielder of the Flame of Anor. The Dark Flame will not avail you, Flame of Udun. Go back to the shadow. You shall not pass.
Fly you fools
YOU SHALL NOT PASS
The burned hand teaches best. After that advice about fire goes to the heart.
Generous deeds should not be checked by cold counsel
Do not take me for some conjuror of cheap tricks. I am not trying to rob you, I'm trying to help you.
It is not despair, for despair is only for those who see the end beyond all doubt. We do not.
You can learn all there is to know about their ways in a month, and yet after a hundred years they can still surprise you.
The world is not in your books and maps; it's out there.
